Text: Employment Cc Amarjit based on the emailed information below we are rescinding Enrons offer of employment You had committed to start work on Wednesday October th and you have indicated that you will not be able to report to work When you return to the United States you are welcome to reapply for a position with Enron Thanks Mark Broadfoot Original Message From Amarjit Singh mailto Sent Sunday October PM To Wells Malcolm Subject Apology Hi Malcolm Please accept my sincere apology for not being able to join Enron right now as I had an unavoidable emergency at home that has forced me to come to India over the weekendMy stay here might stretch to approximately a month or soI donot want that the company shall suffer any loss due to my absense so pls advice accordingly Your company offers an invaluable opportunity and I would appreciate any consideration you can give me in rescheduling my joining date after a month Pls contact my fiancee Kamal for any urgent issue as I am keeping my cellphone with herShe would convey the message to me by best means Thank you for your time and consideration Sincerely htmlDIVnbspDIV DIVAmarjit SinghDIV DIVDIV DIVDIVhtml Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp

Employment Cc Amarjit based on the emailed information below we are resending Enrons offer of employment You had committed to start work on Wednesday October th and you have indicated that you will not be able to report to work When you return to the United States you are welcome to reapply for a position with Enron Thanks Mark Broadfoot Original Message From Amarjit Singh mailto Sent Sunday October PM To Wells Malcolm Subject Apology Hi Malcolm Please accept my sincere apology for not being able to join Enron right now as I had an unavoidable emergency at home that has forced me to come to India over the weekendMy stay here might stretch to approximately a month or soI donot want that the company shall suffer any loss due to my absense so pls advice accordingly Your company offers an invaluable opportunity and I would appreciate any consideration you can give me in rescheduling my joining date after a month Pls contact my fiancee Kamal for any urgent issue as I am keeping my cellphone with herShe would convey the message to me by best means Thank you for your time and consideration Sincerely htmlDIVnbspDIV DIVAmarjit SinghDIV DIVDIV DIVDIVhtml Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp
